thread.title: Financial Analyst II at Kaztronix (Bridgewater, NJ)
thread.title_full: Financial Analyst II at Kaztronix (Bridgewater, NJ)

title: Financial Analyst II at Kaztronix (Bridgewater, NJ)
text: Source: Kaztronix This role involves the processing of chargebacks submitted by our wholesale partners. Works closely with the Membership team and ensures chargebacks are paid in compliance with contract eligibility. Skills: Excellent analytical skills, judgment and problem solving ability. -Professional manner and tact - good oral and written communication skills. -Two to three years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry, and/or finance experience preferred. -Organized, accurate with detail oriented discipline, and dedicated to superior quality work. -Strong sense of commitment and teamwork. -Ability to multi-task and meet established deadlines. -Microsoft office with excellent Excel skills. -CARS/IS experience a plus. Education: Bachelor s Degree with a Finance or Business concentration, or equivalent business experience.
